title: Aen 1 19-22 - SS syllabus - line 4 - Gram - dative

content.description:
Progeniemprogenies, -ei, f.: offspring sed enim Troiano a sanguine duci 
audierat; TyriasTyrius, -a, -um, adj.: Tyrian, of Tyre olim quae verteret arces; 
hinc populum late regem belloque superbum 
venturum excidioexcidium, -i, n.: destruction LibyaeLibya, -ae, f.: Libya (a country in north Africa).
content.question: In line 4, excidio is translated

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.B: Describe how grammar contributes to the meaning and function of Latin words and phrases in context.
